data.q: What is the browser rendering process primarily responsible for?
o: Converting HTML and CSS into pixels
data.explanation: The rendering process converts HTML, CSS, and JavaScript into visual pixels on the screen.

data.q: Which operation recalculates the layout of elements on a page?
data.explanation: Reflow recalculates element sizes and positions, and is performance-expensive.

data.q: What triggers a repaint but not a reflow?
data.explanation: Changing colors affects appearance but not layout, causing a repaint only.

data.q: Which technique helps reduce initial page load time?
data.explanation: Lazy loading defers loading non-critical resources to improve initial performance.
